Name: Spellcasting
Description: Can cast spells from the Bard spell list.

Name: Bardic Inspiration
Description: Can use a bonus action to grant an ally within 60 feet a d6 inspiration die, which can be added to an ability check or save.

Name: Jack of All Trades
Description: Can add half proficiency bonus to ability checks that don't already include it.

Name: Song of Rest
Description: Can use a bonus action to grant allies within earshot the ability to regain hit points equal to a d6 during a short rest.

Name: Expertise
Description: Becomes proficient in two skills or tools of their choice.

Name: Ability Score Improvement
Description: Can increase one ability score by 2 or two ability scores by 1.

Name: Countercharm
Description: Can use an action to grant allies within earshot advantage on saving throws against being frightened or charmed.

Name: Magical Secrets
Description: Can learn spells from any class's spell list.

Name: Superior Inspiration
Description: The inspiration die becomes a d8.
